content: free pattern available here 1 ready to get cozy this fall get ready for the season with our easy pumpkin knitting pattern perfect for crafters of all skill levels unleash your creativity and create adorable pumpkin decor that will bring warmth and charm to your home skill level beginner will need -5mm circular needles 16 in -bernat premier yarn in carott one skein makes multiple pumpkins -scissors -measuring tape -tapestry needle -polyfil or toy stuffing -cinnamon stick or twig share your finished pumpkins on socials and tag us we would love to see your creations don t forget to follow us on socials threads @cozythreadscanada instagram @cozythreadscanada facebook @cozythreads - canada pinterest @cozythreads 1 https //www cozythreads ca/easy-knit-pumpkin
